nodes.description: 2003年10月4日，巴勒斯坦女性自杀袭击者汉娜迪·贾拉达特在以色列海法市海滨的Maxim餐厅发动自杀爆炸，造成21人死亡、51人受伤，包括4名儿童和一名两个月大的婴儿
nodes.support_text: On October 4, 2003, the 28-year-old Palestinian suicide bomber Hanadi Jaradat detonated the explosive belt she was wearing inside the Arab-Jewish Maxim restaurant in Haifa.

nodes.description: 袭击者贾拉达特21岁时未婚夫被以色列军方击毙，其堂兄和弟弟被指控为伊斯兰抵抗运动成员后遭以色列 forces杀害，促使她参与自杀袭击
nodes.support_text: According to a story in Ha'aretz, based on Arab media and interviews with Israeli and Arab sources, she agreed to the bombing after Israel Defense Forces undercover operatives in Jenin killed her cousin (Salah, 34), and her younger brother (Fadi, 25), both of whom were accused by Israeli forces of being Islamic Jihad operatives...

nodes.description: 以色列军方在袭击次日摧毁贾拉达特家族住宅及两名无关邻居房屋，并对叙利亚大马士革的据点发动空袭
nodes.support_text: The day following the suicide bombing, the Israeli Army demolished the home of Jaradat's family, and the homes of two neighbors who were uninvolved in the bombing. In response to the attack... an alleged terrorist training camp in Ain es-Saheb, Syria, was bombed by four Israeli Air Force jets.

nodes.description: 以色列警方在11月7日逮捕策划袭击的伊斯兰抵抗运动高级成员阿贾德·阿比迪，并在 Jenin 开展军事行动期间击毙一名巴勒斯坦青少年
nodes.support_text: During the operation, Jenin was placed under curfew as soldiers searched homes. One Palestinian teenager was shot dead while climbing a tank, and three Palestinians were wounded.

nodes.description: 以色列总理沙龙将袭击责任归咎于巴勒斯坦总统阿拉法特，后者同时谴责袭击行为，美国总统布什称其为‘可耻的谋杀行动’
nodes.support_text: It was condemned by Palestinian President Yasser Arafat. The restaurant's interior was destroyed by the blast (it was completely rebuilt seven months after the attack).

nodes.description: Maxim餐厅在爆炸后七个月内完成重建并重新营业，海法市为此建立纪念受害者纪念碑
nodes.support_text: The restaurant's interior was destroyed by the blast (it was completely rebuilt seven months after the attack).

nodes.description: 2012年阿拉伯律师协会授予贾拉达特父亲荣誉奖项，称其自杀袭击‘为巴勒斯坦和阿拉伯民族辩护’
nodes.support_text: 2012年阿拉伯律师协会授予贾拉达特父亲荣誉奖项，称其自杀袭击‘为巴勒斯坦和阿拉伯民族辩护’

nodes.description: 2017年海法餐厅受害者奥兰·阿尔莫格在联合国安理会呼吁终止对恐怖分子的经济补偿政策
nodes.support_text: 2017年海法餐厅受害者奥兰·阿尔莫格在联合国安理会呼吁终止对恐怖分子的经济补偿政策
